resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81388</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81388</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4529</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Climatic Areas Crossword</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigramas sobre áreas climáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceantair Chomhaeráide – Crosfhocal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimatisches Bereiche Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé Climatiques de Zones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword Climático Das Áreas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate Climatiche Di Zone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλιματολογικό σταυρόλεξο περιοχών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Printable crossword requiring students to fill in keywords associated with various climatic areas around the world. Answers are included.</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama que se puede imprimir, requiere que los estudiantes lo rellenen con palabras clave asociadas con las diferentes áreas climáticas del mundo. Se incluyen las respuestas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal inphriontáilte ina líonann daltaí eochairfhocail a bhaineann le roinnt áiteanna aeráide timpeall an domhain. Tugtar na freagraí.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía</string>
            <string language="ga">Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">O9: Atmosphere / Ocean</string>
            <string language="es">O9: Atmósfera/Océano. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">O9: Atmaisféar / Aigean</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das bedruckbare Kreuzworträtsel, das 
Kursteilnehmer benötigt, Schlüsselwörter auszufüllen, verband mit 
verschiedenen klimatischen Bereichen um die Welt. Antworten sind
enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les mots croisé imprimables exigeant des 
étudiants de compléter des mots-clés se sont associés à de 
diverses zones climatiques autour du monde. Les réponses sont 
incluses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O crossword printable que requer estudantes 
preencher keywords associou com as várias áreas climáticas em torno
do mundo. As respostas são incluídas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le parole incrociate stampabili che richiedono 
agli allievi di riempire le parole chiavi si sono associate con le 
varie zone climatiche intorno al mondo. Le risposte sono 
incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτυπώσιμο σταυρόλεξο που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για 
να συμπληρώσει τις λέξεις κλειδιά που συνδέονται με τις διάφορες 
κλιματολογικές περιοχές σε όλο τον κόσμο. Οι απαντήσεις 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">O9: Atmosphäre/Ozean</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">O9 : l'Atmosphère/Océan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O9: Atmosfera/Oceano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">O9: Atmosfera/Oceano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">O9: Ατμόσφαιρα/ωκεανός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4529</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>open activity</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
